verses.verse: Then we turned, <S%H6437><s%> and took <S%H5265><s%> our journey <S%H5265><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me: and we compassed <S%H5437><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
You have compassed <S%H5437><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> long <S%H7227><s%> enough: turn <S%H6437><s%> you northward. <S%H6828><s%>

And command <S%H6680><s%> you the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> You are to pass <S%H5674><s%> through the coast <S%H1366><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir; <S%H8165><s%> and they shall be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you: take you good <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to yourselves therefore:

Meddle <S%H1624><s%> not with them; for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you of their land, <S%H776><s%> no, not so much <S%H5704><s%> as a foot <S%H7272><s%> breadth; <S%H4096><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

You shall buy <S%H7666><s%> meat <S%H400><s%> of them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that you may eat; <S%H398><s%> and you shall also <S%H1571><s%> buy <S%H3739><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> of them for money, <S%H3701><s%> that you may drink. <S%H8354><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of your hand: <S%H3027><s%> he knows <S%H3045><s%> your walking <S%H3212><s%> through this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wilderness: <S%H4057><s%> these <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has been with you; you have lacked <S%H2637><s%> nothing. <S%H3808><s%>

And when we passed <S%H5674><s%> by from our brothers <S%H251><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> through the way <S%H1870><s%> of the plain <S%H6160><s%> from Elath, <S%H359><s%> and from Eziongaber, <S%H6100><s%> we turned <S%H6437><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Distress <S%H6696><s%> not the Moabites, <S%H4124><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> contend <S%H1624><s%> with them in battle: <S%H4421><s%> for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you of their land <S%H776><s%> for a possession; <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>
The Emims <S%H368><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein in times past, a people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%>
Which <S%H1992><s%> also <S%H637><s%> were accounted <S%H2803><s%> giants, <S%H7497><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%> but the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> them Emims. <S%H368><s%>

The Horims <S%H2752><s%> also dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%> beforetime; <S%H6440><s%> but the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, when they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> them, and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their stead; <S%H8478><s%> as Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of his possession, <S%H3425><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them.

Now <S%H6258><s%> rise <S%H6965><s%> up, said I, and get <S%H5674><s%> you over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%> And we went <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%>

And the space <S%H3117><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> we came <S%H1980><s%> from Kadeshbarnea, <S%H6947><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we were come <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered, <S%H2218><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and eight <S%H8083><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the generation <S%H1755><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were wasted <S%H8552><s%> out from among <S%H7130><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> swore <S%H7650><s%> to them.

For indeed <S%H1571><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was against them, to destroy <S%H2000><s%> them from among <S%H7130><s%> the host, <S%H4264><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they were consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

So it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when <S%H834><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> were consumed <S%H8552><s%> and dead <S%H4191><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>
That the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
You are to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> through Ar, <S%H6144><s%> the coast <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> this day: <S%H3117><s%>

And when you come <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> over <S%H4136><s%> against <S%H4136><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> distress <S%H6696><s%> them not, nor <S%H408><s%> meddle <S%H1624><s%> with them: for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you of the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> any possession; <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> for a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

(That also <S%H637><s%> was accounted <S%H2803><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> of giants: <S%H7497><s%> giants <S%H7497><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein in old <S%H6440><s%> time; and the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Zamzummims; <S%H2157><s%>

A people <S%H5971><s%> great, <S%H1419><s%> and many, <S%H7227><s%> and tall, <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakims; <S%H6062><s%> but the LORD <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their stead: <S%H8478><s%>

As he did <S%H6213><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> which dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> when <S%H834><s%> he destroyed <S%H8045><s%> the Horims <S%H2752><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they succeeded <S%H3423><s%> them, and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their stead <S%H8478><s%> even to this <S%H2088><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%>

And the Avims <S%H5757><s%> which dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Hazerim, <S%H2699><s%> even to Azzah, <S%H5804><s%> the Caphtorims, <S%H3732><s%> which came <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of Caphtor, <S%H3731><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in their stead. <S%H8478><s%>)

Rise <S%H6965><s%> you up, take your journey, <S%H5265><s%> and pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Arnon: <S%H769><s%> behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> into your hand <S%H3027><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and his land: <S%H776><s%> begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, and contend <S%H1624><s%> with him in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> will I begin <S%H2490><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> of you and the fear <S%H3374><s%> of you on the nations <S%H5971><s%> that are under <S%H8478><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who <S%H834><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> report <S%H8088><s%> of you, and shall tremble, <S%H7264><s%> and be in anguish <S%H2342><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of you.

And I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> out of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land: <S%H776><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> along by the high <S%H1870><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> I will neither <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H5493><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> nor to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

You shall sell <S%H7666><s%> me meat <S%H400><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may eat; <S%H398><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> that I may drink: <S%H8354><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> I will pass <S%H5674><s%> through on <S%H5921><s%> my feet; <S%H7272><s%>

(As the children <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> and the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> which dwell <S%H3427><s%> in Ar, <S%H6144><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to me;) until <S%H5704><s%> I shall pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> us.

But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> would <S%H14><s%> not let us pass <S%H5674><s%> by him: for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hardened <S%H7185><s%> his spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and made his heart <S%H3824><s%> obstinate, <S%H553><s%> that he might deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> as appears this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, Behold, <S%H7200><s%> I have begun <S%H2490><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you: begin <S%H2490><s%> to possess, <S%H3423><s%> that you may inherit <S%H3423><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>
Then Sihon <S%H5511><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out against <S%H7125><s%> us, he and all <S%H3605><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> to fight <S%H4421><s%> at Jahaz. <S%H3096><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> us; and we smote <S%H5221><s%> him, and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

And we took <S%H3920><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> the men, <S%H4962><s%> and the women, <S%H802><s%> and the little <S%H2945><s%> ones, of every <S%H3605><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> we left <S%H7604><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> to remain: <S%H8300><s%>
Only <S%H7535><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> we took for a prey <S%H962><s%> to ourselves, and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we took. <S%H3920><s%>

From Aroer, <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the brink <S%H8193><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon, <S%H769><s%> and from the city <S%H5892><s%> that is by the river, <S%H5158><s%> even to Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> there was not one city <S%H7151><s%> too strong <S%H7682><s%> for us: the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> to us:

Only <S%H7535><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> you came <S%H7126><s%> not, nor to any <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H3027><s%> of the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok, <S%H2999><s%> nor to the cities <S%H5892><s%> in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> nor to whatever <S%H3605><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> forbade <S%H6680><s%> us.
